text:
@GovWhitmer "The fire stopped burning after it destroyed the entire house."

Congrats on the worst COVID death rate of any non-coastal state.

Probably could have been avoided if Gretchen Whitmer hadn't ordered nursing homes (!) to admit COVID+ patients (!!!)

https://t.co/uRQQXXlfaw https://t.co/WThILsktJ6
